mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_notice (tenant_id, topic, content, creator, create_time, deleted) VALUES (#{tenantId}, #{topic}, #{content}, #{creator}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM erp_notice WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.update: UPDATE erp_notice SET deleted=1 WHERE id = #{id}
